You can use the custom server options to:
You can use the custom server options to sign into other Fabric servers by specifying a different Home server URL.
This allows you to use RPG Chat with an existing Fabric account on a different home server.

You can also set a custom identity server but you won't be able to invite users by email address, or be invited by email address yourself.
